text:
The release of water from Mettur dam for farm activities in Delta districts was further stepped down to 1,000 cusecs on Tuesday. About 2,000 cusecs of water was being discharged from the dam for the last few days.

The water level in the Mettur dam stood at 69.71 feet on Tuesday against its full level of 120 feet. The storage level stood at 32.453 tmc against its full capacity of 93.470 tmc. The inflow into the dam was 192 cusecs, PWD sources said.
title: Water level in Mettur Dam
